bwwExcerpt: “Purpose” toggles between the old and new — be it in discussions about political sacrifice, queerness or parenthood. This tension is so essential that designer Todd Rosenthal builds it into his set: a nod to classic architecture and proverbial Afrocentric homeyness accented with contemporary touches...
nycTheatreExcerpt: Playwright Branden Jacobs-Jenkins' latest is a feast of the good stuff - crackling dialogue, powerhouse ensemble acting and weighty themes delivered with biting naturalism.
